All features: WI-C100
Made for the day ahead

Wireless Bluetooth headphones that take your music wherever life brings you.1 With up to 25hrs of battery life, the WI-C100 headphones provide high-quality listening.2 Comfortable and easy to use, these headphones provide piece of mind with a IPX4 Splash resistance design.3
Long battery life
Enjoy up to 25hrs of battery life for non-stop listening.2 And if your headphones are running low on power, a 10-minute quick charge will give you up to 60 minutes of playback.
DSEE – Give your favorite music a boost
When an original musical file is compressed our Digital Sound Enhancement Engine faithfully restores music to high-quality sound that’s closer to the original recording.
A comfortable fit
A well-balanced shape around the neck ensures a stable fit, while the housing follows the contours of the ear for maximum comfort.
IPX4 splash-proof and sweat-proof design
With an IPX4 water resistance rating, splashes and sweat won’t stop these headphones – so you can keep on moving to the music.3
Easy to use buttons

The WI-C100 headphones are easy to operate, with buttons to play and pause, skip tracks, adjust the volume, and receive calls. For convenience, the buttons have been redesigned, with a more pronounced shape making them easier to press.
Fits easily into your life
Clear hands-free call quality
Siri Voice Assistant Compatible
Fast Pairing
Swift Pair - Connect to your PC easily
Conversations flow freely with clear hands-free calls thanks to our high-quality built-in microphone, You won’t even have to take your phone out of your pocket.
One simple button press connects you to Siri so you can find directions, play music, communicate with contact and so much more.4,7

Enjoy fast pairing capability with Google’s new Fast Pair feature on the WI-C100.1,4 Quickly and effortlessly pair your headphones with your Android device with just a simple tap. You can also easily locate your headphones by pinging them or checking their last known location on your smartphone.

Swift pair makes it quick and easy to pair your WI-C100 headphones with your Windows 11 and 10 computers via Bluetooth.1,4 Pop-up pairing guidance appears on nearby Windows 10 devices when pairing mode is selected.
Flexible neckband
Lightweight and portable, the WI-C100 headphones have a flexible neckband that makes them even easier to slip into your bag when you’re on the move.
Packed with features

The WI-C100 wireless in-ear headphones offer great value, with a wealth of features including long battery life2, high-quality sound, splash-proof design3, and compatibility with the Sony | Headphones Connect app5.
Bluetooth
Well-balanced tuning
With Bluetooth wireless technology, you can connect to your device wirelessly and enjoy table uninterrupted listening.1
Tuning in the WI-C100 are well balanced from low to high frequencies, and vocals are natural and clear. These headphones are made to match any music genre.
Your sound, just how you like it

Tailor your sound to your personal preference. Choose from a variety of presets to match the genre of music you’re listening to, or create and save your own custom presets using the equalizer feature on the Sony | Headphones Connect app.5
Make your music sound more natural

When an original music source is compressed, it loses the high-frequency elements that add detail and richness to a track. Our Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) faithfully restores them to produce high-quality sound that’s closer to the original recording.[A] Restoration  [B] Fine sound restoration
Dolby Atmos Experience

With a Sony WLA-NS7 wireless transmitter connected to your BRAVIA XR TV, your headphones create the ideal arrangement of phantom speakers all around you so can enjoy a Dolby Atmos experience.6 Be immersed in the scene and feel right at the heart of the action.
360 Spatial Sound Personalizer

With the Sony | 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer app6, you enjoy a sound experience that’s optimized for you. The app captures and analyses your ear shape, allowing these headphones to create your own personal spatial sound field when paired with BRAVIA XR TV’s.
360 Reality Audio

Immerse yourself in sound all around you. Sound ss real as if you are there at a live concert or with the artist in the recording studio. With 360 Reality Audio, music has never been so immersive and so real.5
Sustainability in mind

Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. Plastic compromises less then five per cent of the packaging material for the WI-C100 headphones, reflecting Sony’s commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.8

Tuning in the WI-C100 are well balanced from low to high frequencies, and vocals are natural and clear. These headphones are made to match any music genre.
